Docs.summary: Provides interconversion of managed objects and unmanaged Graphics Device Interface (GDI) DEVMODE structures.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This namespace is part of the enhanced printing services provided with [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)]. Managed code developers using [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] must use the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api](~/includes/tlasharptla-api-md.md)] in the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace.
